description: Go hiking in classic style with Vardag Anorak made from durable, weather-resistant G-1000 Eco. The design is simple with adjustable hood, kangaroo pocket and hand pockets. Its loose fit combined with a long front zipper and a side zipper makes it easy to pull on/take off and wear with other layers. A timeless, long-lasting garment for hiking, daytrips and everyday use, all year round.
name: Fjallraven Vardag Anorak - Mens
